description: This file contains SQLAlchemy ORM model definitions for core database tables of a music streaming service backend, including users, artists, albums, tracks, playlists, playback history, user activity, admin audit logs, and recommendations cache.

classes.name: Base
classes.description: Declarative base class for ORM models, used as a superclass for all models.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a platform user account with attributes like email, password, display name, activity status, admin status, and notification settings.

classes.name: Artist
classes.description: Represents a music artist with name and bio, related to albums and tracks.

classes.name: Album
classes.description: Represents a music album with title, artist, release year, cover image, and related tracks.

classes.name: Track
classes.description: Represents a music track with title, artist, optional album, genre, duration, and audio URL.

classes.name: Playlist
classes.description: Represents a user-owned playlist with name, description, cover image, visibility, and related tracks.

classes.name: PlaylistTrack
classes.description: Association table linking playlists and tracks with track order and added timestamp.

classes.name: PlaybackHistory
classes.description: Tracks playback events per user, including timestamp and duration.

classes.name: UserActivity
classes.description: Logs user actions for analytics and auditing purposes.

classes.name: RecommendationsCache
classes.description: Stores cached recommendations for users to improve retrieval performance.
